name: TouchMe Body Butter 16 oz.
description:
Transform your skin with Divine Naturals TouchMe Body Butter.  A luxurious, soft and delicious blend of Natural Almond Butter and Soy, which offers a high level of moisturization and aids in cellular regeneration.  Use on damp skin to seal in moisture.  

Ingredients:  Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Almond), Vaccinium Macrocarpon Fruit (Cranberry), Theobroma Grandiflorum Seed Butter
(Cupuacu), Glycine Soja (Soy)

All Natural* No Preservatives * Dye Free * Cruelty Free

name: Natural Whipped Hair Butter 8 oz.
description:
Divine Naturals Whipped Hair Butter promotes health hair & scalp.  A wonderful nourishing blend of Shea Butter, Avocado and Coconut oil.  

Ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Brassica oleraceae Italica (Broccoli) Seed Oil, Rosa Rubiginosa (Rose Hip) Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Propanediol, Soy Lecithin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Achilea Millefolium (Yarrow) Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Utica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Exgtract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Fragrance

name: TouchMe Body Polish 16 oz
description:
Transform your skin with Divine Naturals TouchMe Body Polish!  A delicious blend of organic pure cane sugar and Cupuacu.  Experience skin so soft and smooth you'll be touching your skin all day.  It's called TouchMe for a reason! 

After cleansing rub onto skin with circular motions.  Rinse the excess body polish off with warm water.  Get ready for silky, smooth, touchable skin!  Follow with  Divine Naturals TouchMe Body Butter.

Ingredients:  Organic Pure Cane Sugar, Theobroma Grandilorum (Cupuacu), Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Ferment Filtrate (Natural Preservative)
